entries.title: YaaiiA
entries.desc: Short for "Yet another alien invasion in Atlanta", this was an entry for the Dreamhack Atlanta 2018 game jam that I collaborated on, developed in Unity.

entries.title: Twilight Punkster Galaxy
entries.desc: Started work on the MMORPG "Twilight Punkster Galaxy" as a fullstack developer, working with Express and Vue.js.

entries.title: Stardust
entries.desc: Briefly worked with Stardust's blockchain technologies in Electron before immediately moving to TPG.

entries.title: Corgi Stack 3D
entries.desc: Sequel to my entry for the 2016 Corgsmas game jam, Corgi Stack 3D is a reimagined puzzle-platformer comprised of various breeds and sizes of dogs acting as moving platforms.

entries.title: Untitled Worm I/O
entries.desc: A shortlived Slither.io inspired project, utilizing cryptocurrency as a driving mechanic.
